item.title: UCCLI
item.description: Introduction UCCLI is framework for the distribution and execution of versioned tooling and processes. The main problems it seeks to solve are as follows. New starters having to install n amounts of software in their laptop setup Established team members having to each maintain a wide set of tooling on their own machines, and be consious about falling out of versions of tooling to that of their peers Team members coodirdinating the upgrade of tooling on their machines amongst themselves and other teams Team members maintaing a common set of aliases on their machines The tooling on developer machines being a different version or missing from CI/CD workers There not being a standard way in which to perform a specific action
